general_advisory: Farmers are advised to irrigate their fields due to mildly dry conditions. Specific crop advice includes managing diseases and applying recommended fertilizers and pesticides at appropriate stages.

advisory: To manage stem borer in paddy, use Trichogrammajaponicum card @ 1/acre at weekly intervals.
To manage stem rot in groundnut, drench soil with Validamycin 3% L @ 400-ml/acre.
To prevent red rot disease, select resistant varieties and soak setts in a solution before planting.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray recommended fungicides.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray recommended fungicides.
To control cut worm, spray recommended insecticides at evening hours.
To control mites, spray recommended insecticides.
To control aphids, use neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight, spray recommended fungicides at intervals.
To control black spot disease, spray Copper Oxy-chloride.
Maintain water depth for fish hibernation in the bottom zone.
